title: San Francisco/Golden Gate
name: Crissy Field Center
content: The Crissy Field Center includes an activity area, learning and computer labs, a teaching kitchen, library, and an information area and bookstore. The center offers a rich array of education programs that serve the entire San Francisco community. Focusing on the convergence of Urban and Natural Environments, educational programs and activities promote multicultural perspectives, environmental stewardship, and community service.  They also have a small cafe inside the premises serving up organic, locally sourced food.
